Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.label: Satellite «Loyalist»
Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.description: A small satellite equipped with communications and solar panels. There is no military capability, but the satellite is capable of communicating with other space objects.

Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.label: Satellite «Percival»
Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.description: A mid-size satellite designed to collect space debris in orbit for sending to earth. For delivery of debris, a cargo beacon is required.

Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.label: Satellite «Titan»
Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.description: A heavy military satellite equipped with a cryogenic beam. The weapon takes a long time to discharge, but it can quickly destroy biological life in a small radius.

Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.label: Satellite «Megalith»
Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.description: A heavy satellite equipped with many solar panels. Can be connected to a «Hive» station or used to attack if charged.

Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.label: Satellite «Monkeylord»
Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.description: A medium-sized satellite equipped with heavy laser weapons. Possesses great destructive power.

Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.label: Satellite «Salem»
Cosmos.Defs.SatelliteDef.description: A heavy satellite with a photon emitter. Able to temporarily hide a group of allied soldiers from view, creating the effect of optical invisibility.
